channel.title: RSC - Landscape
channel.description:
Couple of question's here,
Does the rsc landscape use DirectX/OpenGL or is it pure Java? If not,
Is it possible to port the landscape PLUS camera functions into another language, Basicly like.. A picturebox that displays a sector you choose, and you can rotate/pan across the map, It's probably alot to explain so if someone could point me in the right direction, What files i'd need to look into ect.
Thanks :)

item.title: RSC - Landscape
item.dc:creator: @dimebagx dimebagx
item.description:
@dimebagx wrote:

From what i’ve seen, (skim reading) through the client files, it’s made up of tiles, and from the gameplay,
i’d say it’s done via perspective?
3d coding always gets to me, it’s difficult, thats why i’d rather port it

Then adding textures is another story :S

Read full topic

item.title: RSC - Landscape
item.dc:creator: @Nemesis1 Nemesis-
item.description:
@Nemesis1 wrote:

Im pretty sure it’s pure java. Yes it’s possible

Read full topic
